title: The novelty every act a play : being a short pastoral, comedy, masque, tragedy, and farce, after the Italian manner : as it is acted at the new-theatre in Little Lincolns Inn-Fields, by His Majesties servants / written by Mr. Motteux and other hands.
author: Motteux, Peter Anthony, 1660-1718.
publisher: Printed for Rich. Parker ... and Peter Buck ...,
